sentences.en: Almighty God, have mercy on us.
sentences.cn: 全能的上主，请垂怜我们。

sentences.en: drifting in an open boat, at the mercy of the elements.
sentences.cn: 在一敞篷船中漂泊，任由暴风雨摆布

sentences.en: God have mercy on his soul.
sentences.cn: 愿上帝宽恕他的灵魂。

sentences.en: He showed no mercy to his enemies.
sentences.cn: 他对敌人毫不仁慈。

sentences.en: He's going to throw himself on the mercy of the court.
sentences.cn: 他准备听凭法庭发落。

sentences.en: Kelly prayed that God would judge her with mercy.
sentences.cn: 凯莉祈求在接受最后的审判时能得到上帝的怜悯。

sentences.en: may the Lord have mercy on her soul.
sentences.cn: 愿主宽恕她的灵魂。

sentences.en: Mercy to the enemies means cruelty to the people.
sentences.cn: 对敌人的仁慈就意味着对人民的残忍.

sentences.en: Ordinary people are at the mercy of faceless bureaucrats.
sentences.cn: 普通人的命运任凭那些平庸刻板的官僚们摆布。

sentences.en: She went down on her knees, pleading for mercy.
sentences.cn: 她双膝跪下, 乞求谅解.

sentences.en: The criminal flopped down on his knees and begged for mercy.
sentences.cn: 那犯人忽然跪下来求饶.

sentences.en: The Emperor must realize that he has us at his mercy.
sentences.cn: 皇帝必须意识到我们任由他处置。

sentences.en: the forest is left to the mercy of the loggers.
sentences.cn: 森林任凭伐木工随意砍伐。

sentences.en: The jury added a rider to their verdict recommending mercy.
sentences.cn: 陪审团在裁决后加了一条建议宽恕的附文.

sentences.en: The murderer's entreaties for mercy availed to nothing.
sentences.cn: 无人理会杀人犯的求饶.

sentences.en: They meant to finish her off, swiftly and without mercy.
sentences.cn: 他们打算毫不留情地迅速结果了她。

sentences.en: They will not pity, nor spare, nor have mercy.
sentences.cn: 他们不会同情, 不会宽恕, 也不会发慈悲的.

sentences.en: We do pray you to show mercy.
sentences.cn: 我们恳求你发发慈悲.

sentences.en: We humbly beg Your Majesty to show mercy.
sentences.cn: 我们恳请陛下发发慈悲.

sentences.en: We try to strike a balance between justice and mercy.
sentences.cn: 我们设法做到宽严并济,恩威兼施.

phrases.phrase: be thankful (或 grateful) for small mercies
phrases.tran_cn: 庆幸不利情况已略有改善
出于慈悲；出于恻隐之心

phrases.phrase: leave someone/thing to the mercy of
phrases.tran_cn: 听任…由（可能有危险或危害的形势）摆布

trans.tran_en: if someone shows mercy, they choose to forgive or to be kind to someone who they have the power to hurt or punish
